attributes.action: Release the Russian report into the Influence they had over the brexit vote.
attributes.additional_details:
This is so important now Russia has invaded Ukraine. If they did influence the brexit vote, it renders it null and void.
The report should be released in full unredacted form
attributes.background: Debate what influence the Russians had over the poll.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610066
